issue.title: Static data members of ctype_base are not yet required to be usable in constant expressions

discussion.p: It may be desired that static data members ctype_base are "real constants", i.e. usable in constant expressions. However, this is not strictly required because mask is only required to be a bitmask type that can be a class type, which makes the plain const potentially insufficient.

blockquote.p: -1- The type mask is a bitmask type ().
